name: Portal Hunter
description:
BSU Game Dev project 2.

On your quest to discover all of the hidden portals, a strange platform you found in a cave teleports you to an ancient lava temple. To your surprise, the portal there is inactive. You must find a way to activate it in order to escape!

Spoiler alert!:

The video reveals how to activate the portal (in order to demo this game for grading purposes), so don't watch before playing if you want to solve the puzzles by yourself.

Controls:

Movement: A, S, D, W / left gamepad joystick

Camera: mouse movement (after clicking screen) / right gamepad joystick

Jump: automatic at edges while running or for manual use spacebar / bottom gamepad button

Interact: left click or x / left gamepad button

Attack (after obtaining item): right click / right gamepad trigger
